lines.text: Hey, something's burning back here. Oh no, it's me. Help! Somebody! Anybody! Get me some baking soda! I'm KINDLING!
Well, your body went years ago.
Hey Slip, what about the luck dragon?
Oh no, this isn't my favorite part of the story.
Looks like he's all out of luck.
Why are you always dissing me man?
Why don't you look in the mirror and find out.

[as Old Man of Wandering Mountain]
There will be a day when the writing stylus will start to act strangely.
Looks like things are getting a little nasty at the bux residence.
No. You did! And you too! Don't go blaming it on me. I didn't put those words into your parents mouths. They said it themselves.

[as the rest of the kids run from a group of bullies known as "The Nasties"]
Come on!
Can you guys show me where the men's room is?
Well, I think you're personally right. We'll escort you to the men's room.
